data transfer
lb 0010000
lbu 0010001
sb 0011000
lw 0010010
sw 0011001
lsp 0010100
arithmetic
add 1000000
sub 1000001
addi 1010011
subi 1010100
mul 1000010
muh 1000011
mulu 1000100
muhu 1000101
div 1000110
divu 1000111
modu 1001000
and 1001001
or 1001010
not 1001011
xor 1001100
rr 1001101
srl 1001110
sra 1001111
sl 1010000
slt 1010001
sltu 1010010
slti 1010101
sltiu 1010110
control
j 0000001
jal 0000010
beq 0000011
bneq 0000100
bgez 0000101
bgtz 0000110
blez 0000111
bltz 0001000
